name: Melancholic Hope
description:
Melancholic Hope is a short visual novel detailing my experiences with depression

Made using Naninovel and Unity

Read time is an estimated 7-14 minutes.

Content Warnings: Mental illness warning (Depression), implied self-harm

Recommended for ages 15+

Language: English

CREDITS: 

All credits for character art and story go to Sokishi

Backgrounds were made using Novel AI

Music & SFX from: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
